entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -29.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 09:50 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -33.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then to 60 gusting to 80. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
